name: part_007
file: tmp_【＃一条莉々華生誕祭2025】初の生誕ライブ開幕！！一条莉々華生誕祭ライブ2025【一条莉々華⧸hololive DEV_IS　ReGLOSS】 [HB8sU0qsePE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Ichijou Ririka and Takane Lui perform the song 'Overbird'.
MC segment where Tokoyami Towa joins Ichijou Ririka and Takane Lui on stage.

subtitles.original: オーバーバード
subtitles.english: Overbird

subtitles.original: 四六時中、乖離の海で 面倒くささを押し付けられてる 何から何まで
subtitles.english: All day long, in the sea of dissociation, laziness is being pushed upon me. Everything from A to Z.

subtitles.original: しごきはやめて まとめ役なら 聞き上手うなずき合ってる 仲良しこよしで
subtitles.english: Stop the harsh training. If you're the mediator, be a good listener and nod along, all buddy-buddy.

subtitles.original: さあ、だだだだ黙れだまりたまえよ
subtitles.english: Now, be qu-qu-qu-quiet, please just shut up.

subtitles.original: 言えないねそんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: I can't say such strong words.

subtitles.original: 少しだけ静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I just want you to be a little bit quieter.

subtitles.original: あ、私たち大望へ
subtitles.english: Ah, we are heading towards a great ambition.

subtitles.original: 世界征服、ヤヤヤヤ果たすその日まで
subtitles.english: World domination, ya ya ya ya, until the day it's fulfilled.

subtitles.original: レレレ獄、ヤヤヤヤあなたの周りもヨヨヨヨ
subtitles.english: Le le le prison, ya ya ya ya, even around you, yo yo yo yo.

subtitles.original: 世界征服、アレアレア約束の地まで
subtitles.english: World domination, oh oh oh, until the promised land.

subtitles.original: さあ、掲げよバッテンバッテン 伝染服ヤヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Now, raise the X mark. Infectious clothes, ya ya ya ya.

subtitles.original: 今日も嫌いそっちのけだね 嫌になるから私一人でも やっておきますね
subtitles.english: Today too, you're ignoring what you hate. It makes me sick, so I'll do it by myself.

subtitles.original: 全て、全て、全て任せて それをさせてよ 大事な事なの 分かっているでしょう
subtitles.english: Leave everything, everything, everything to me. Let me do it. It's important, you know that, right?

subtitles.original: 四六時中、乖離の海で 面倒くさいまま今日明日過ぎて行くのでしょう
subtitles.english: All day long, in the sea of dissociation, being troublesome, today and tomorrow will pass by.

subtitles.original: 花瓶に水をあげましょう 時の中 しおれた事忘れてた
subtitles.english: Let's water the vase. Inside time, I forgot that things had withered.

subtitles.original: さあ、だだだだ黙れだまりたまえよ
subtitles.english: Now, be qu-qu-qu-quiet, please just shut up.

subtitles.original: 言えないねそんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: I can't say such strong words.

subtitles.original: 少しだけ静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I just want you to be a little bit quieter.

subtitles.original: あ、私たち大望へ
subtitles.english: Ah, we are heading towards a great ambition.

subtitles.original: 今と未来見たかったはずなのに
subtitles.english: Even though we should have wanted to see the present and the future.

subtitles.original: 世界征服、ヤヤヤヤ見えぬその日まで
subtitles.english: World domination, ya ya ya ya, until the day it's invisible.

subtitles.original: ドドドド永遠、ヤヤヤヤこの世の理ヨヨヨヨ
subtitles.english: Do do do eternity, ya ya ya ya, the truth of this world, yo yo yo yo.

subtitles.original: 今は征服、ササササあなたの街中
subtitles.english: Now it's domination, sa sa sa sa, throughout your city.

subtitles.original: 形作るバッテンだ
subtitles.english: Creating the X mark.

subtitles.original: 世界征服、ヤヤヤヤ果たすその日まで
subtitles.english: World domination, ya ya ya ya, until the day it's fulfilled.

subtitles.original: レレレ獄、ヤヤヤヤあなたの周りもヨヨヨヨ
subtitles.english: Le le le prison, ya ya ya ya, even around you, yo yo yo yo.

subtitles.original: 世界征服、アレアレア約束の地まで
subtitles.english: World domination, oh oh oh, until the promised land.

subtitles.original: さあ、掲げよバッテンバッテン 転覆したらヴィンテージのワインを空けましょう
subtitles.english: Now, raise the X mark. If it's overturned, let's open a vintage wine.

subtitles.original: はーーー！お疲れ様でしたーー！
subtitles.english: Haa! Great job everyone!

subtitles.original: ヒューーー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Whew! Yay!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで引き続きゲストパートお送りしておりましたが…
subtitles.english: Alright, so we've been continuing with the guest part...

subtitles.original: なんと、もう一人MCに呼びたいと思います！
subtitles.english: And believe it or not, I want to call one more person for the MC!

subtitles.original: 誰だ誰だ誰だ？
subtitles.english: Who is it, who is it, who is it?

subtitles.original: トワ先輩ーー！
subtitles.english: Towa-senpai!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！！
subtitles.english: Yay!!

subtitles.original: 来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming!

subtitles.original: いやこちらこそ！
subtitles.english: No, the pleasure is mine!

subtitles.original: ちょっとせっかくなんで自己紹介して頂いてもいいですか？
subtitles.english: Since you're here, could you please introduce yourself?

subtitles.original: はい！オッケー！ホロライブ4期生の…
subtitles.english: Yes! Okay! From hololive 4th gen...

subtitles.original: あれ？うっそ？トワ様です！
subtitles.english: Huh? For real? It's Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: あれ？今「こんやっぴー」がないから言えないんだ
subtitles.english: Huh? Since I don't have my 'Kon-yappi' right now, I can't say it.

subtitles.original: こんやっぴーーー！
subtitles.english: Kon-yappi!

subtitles.original: はい、皆さん待たせたねー！ホロックスの女幹部、鷹嶺ルイと申します！
subtitles.english: Yes, kept you all waiting! I'm the executive of holoX, Takane Lui!

subtitles.original: 莉々華、お誕生日おめでとうーー！
subtitles.english: Ririka, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: おめでとうございまーす！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ嬉しいー！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: いや呼んでくれて嬉しいよ、お誕生日にさ
subtitles.english: No, I'm glad you invited me for your birthday.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！もうルイ姉もトワ先輩ももうすごい莉々華に優しくしてくれる…
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! Both Lui-nee and Towa-senpai are always so kind to me...

subtitles.original: もう莉々華的には姉御的な存在なので…
subtitles.english: For me, you are like big sister figures...

subtitles.original: まあまあ、慕ってくれて、慕ってくれて
subtitles.english: Well, well, you look up to us, you look up to us.

subtitles.original: あ、そこは謙遜しないのね
subtitles.english: Oh, you're not being humble there.

subtitles.original: お前もトワのこと慕えよ
subtitles.english: You should look up to Towa too.

subtitles.original: あー、トワ、トワ
subtitles.english: Ah, Towa, Towa.

subtitles.original: だからめっちゃ嬉しいです！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: So I'm really happy! Yay!

subtitles.original: やばい、このキラキラについていけない…
subtitles.english: Oh boy, I can't keep up with this sparkle...
